document_data.name: ''Feydark Crystal''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''feydark crystal''''' was a variety of mineral that was unique to the underground [[Feydark]] region of the [[Feywild]].
document_data.Powers: Each of these crystals possessed a portion of ''feywild energy''.
document_data.Usage: ''Feydark crystals'' were used by the [[Iliyanbruen]] elves of [[New Sharandar]] to provide power to their magical defenses and [[ritual]]s. When placed in the elves' ''purifying pool'' a large portion of them were used by the [[Arcane Reservoir]], while some others were released as individual motes of life energy called ''[[feywild spark]]s''.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Merrisara Winterwhite]], the leader of the Iliyanbruen elves led the efforts to gather ''feydark crystals'' in order to power the Arcane Reservoir.
